title: Account suspended
body: So today I am trying to log into my account to find out it has been suspended and there is no explanation for it from riot, no emails nothing. What is going on?

replies.body:
There's more than a few things it could be. I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support requesting an explanation for the ban and you can go from there:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

already have, but to be honest its very unacceptable just to take a persons account and permanently suspend it without any explanation. Riot did reply with this,

Before further discussing this, we will need to verify you as the account's owner. For security reasons, we are not able to do that while you are logged into a League of Legends account on our Support Site.

In order to proceed further, please provide me with a different email (one that is not associated with any League account). We will create a new ticket for you using this alternate email address, where you can reply and proceed further with your request.

There's a few reasons you receive bans without explanation, usually they are a result of manual and/or unusual suspensions since the system doesn't have a way of automatically knowing what they were for, at which stage you are directed to support for context.

In your case, sounds like it was a security ban for suspicious activity on the account. In other words more than one person has access to the account, and the account has been banned to prevent those who aren't the owner from messing with the account in any way. Once you verify ownership and restore security (change password and such) the ban will be overturned.
